= Top_5_HTML_CSS_JS_code =

== HTML Script Resources ==
    === HTML5 UP ===
_Free responsive HTML5 and CSS3 site templates._
    === CodePen ===
_A community platform where developers share their HTML, CSS, and JavaScript snippets._
    === HTML5 Boilerplate ===
_A front-end template for building fast, robust, and adaptable web apps or sites._
    === W3Schools ===
_A variety of HTML5 examples and templates._
    === FreeHTML5 ===
_A collection of free HTML5 and CSS3 templates._

== CSS Script Resources ==
    === CSS-Tricks ===
_Comprehensive CSS tutorials, tips, and tricks._
    === Codrops ===
_A reference for CSS properties with practical examples._
    === Animate.css ===
_A library of ready-to-use, cross-browser animations for use in web projects._
    === Hover.css ===
_A collection of CSS3 powered hover effects._
    === CSSZenGarden ===
_A demonstration of what can be accomplished through CSS-based design._

== JavaScript Script Resources ==
    === JavaScript.info ===
_A comprehensive guide to modern JavaScript, from basics to advanced topics._
    === jQuery ===
_A fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library._
    === MDN Web Docs - JavaScript ===
_Mozilla's developer resource for JavaScript._
    === Eloquent JavaScript ===
_A book providing a deep dive into JavaScript, available online._
    === JSFiddle ===
_An online IDE for testing and sharing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code snippets._
